title: Column icons don't show up when connecting to Derby database
description: When connecting to a Derby database in the application, the column icons that are supposed to appear are not visible.
OB: When attempting to connect to a Derby database, the column icons are not displayed.
EB: When connecting to a Derby database, the column icons should be visible and displayed correctly.
SR:
1. Launch the application.
2. Go to the database connection settings.
3. Enter the necessary details to connect to a Derby database.
4. Connect to the database.
5. Navigate to the table with columns and observe if the icons are visible or not.
